nodes.text: The Homana system was a star system located in the Strabin sector of the Mid Rim.
It was the home system of the Homanans.
The Homana system was explored sometime between 3000 BBY and 1000 BBY during the Blazing of Hydian and Ruusan. It fell into the area of space known as the New Territories.
By 25 ABY, the Homana system boasted a population of less than a million Homanans.
